Our Life

Morning Light

Ishu, my wife, in morning's glow,
Your smile makes my heart overflow.
Coffee shared and gentle kiss,
Each dawn brings perfect bliss.

Our Garden

In our garden, roses bloom,
Like our love in every room.
Ishu tends each flower with care,
Making life beyond compare.

Sunday Mornings

Lazy Sundays, breakfast late,
Ishu's pancakes on my plate.
Reading papers, sharing tea,
Perfect life for you and me.

Evening Rituals

Day's end brings you to my arms,
Ishu sharing daily charms.
Stories told and secrets shared,
Showing how much we have cared.

Kitchen Dance

Cooking dinner side by side,
Ishu's recipes filled with pride.
Dancing to our favorite song,
Where we know we both belong.

Weekend Projects

Building shelves and painting walls,
Ishu's laughter fills the halls.
Making home with loving care,
Every task a joy to share.

Quiet Moments

Reading books in peaceful night,
Ishu curled up, holding tight.
Simple pleasures, pure and true,
Making dreams of life come true.

Holiday Joy

Decorating festive trees,
Ishu baking cookies sweet.
Traditions made with loving heart,
Never wanting to be apart.

Daily Blessings

Every small task shared with you,
Makes each moment fresh and new.
Ishu's presence in our home,
Makes it where I'll never roam.

Perfect Match

Like tea and honey, perfect pair,
Ishu's love beyond compare.
In marriage found my heart's true place,
Blessed by heaven's sweetest grace.
